author: cms-sw
body: This PR simplifies the creation of toolfiles for new externals. For new externals, one can just copy the one of the existing toolfile and just replace the lib name or paths. `get_tools` will automatically replace `@TOOL@` (tool name e.g. abseil-cpp) and `@UC_TOOL@` (upper case toolname e.g. ABSEIL_C) with correct tool name
title: auto generate/repalce tool name and base variables
